name: TREES, Trees, trees...
description:
You play as Lumberjack Zack, A man who has lost his memory, and you go around chopping trees to your will, go  crazy and have fun

1. Update:

________________________________________

  •  I have found some bugs on my own and have fixed them in this new version.
  • If you want to play the fixed version download the new zip.

2. Bugs Fixed:

____________________

  • UI (Still needs fixed, but at least you can see it)
  • Trees (Apparently Prefabs suck when it comes to random generation)
  • The Main Menu (Should add a way to exit the game though)

_____________________________________

  • Sounds
  • Animations
  • More Items
  • More Lore Bits

  • A Cute Little Icon for the app

4. Things that I need to fix:
